title: Couldn't get the star gaudian skin icon
body: I was just wondering how i fix this problem.

replies.body: It can take a few days for the Star Guardian icon to appear on your account after completing the quiz.
Thank you for your advice i'll wait and see if i get it :D
What issue did you have getting one? As *Lew* mentioned, they can take up to a few days to get added to your account.
It might just be taking a while but i hope i get it because its an awesome icon.
Are you on the right site? If you are on the EUW site and you try to get the icon, it will fail. Check which version you are by looking at the URL and seeing if it says NA or EUW.
alright I will check this out hopefully it helps. :D
